description: This is an HTML source file for a web-based database visualizer UI, containing structure, styling, and client-side JavaScript for interacting with backend API endpoints to display database information, tables, and data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets current selection, and updates the UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for the selected database and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for the selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data as an HTML table with functionalities for cell expansion.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates a table cell, handling objects, long text, and null values.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full data.
